fixes.name: Change MTM stress (in CAD)
fixes.dax_expression: 'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[MTM Stress T (In CAD)] - 'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[MTM Stress T-1  (In CAD)]
fixes.solution_explanation: Direct translation of the Tableau expression subtracting two calculated fields. All field references were converted to the table[column] format required for DAX. The expression returns the difference between 'MTM Stress T (In CAD)' and 'MTM Stress T-1  (In CAD)'.
fixes.type_changed_reason: Dependent calculated fields reference Parameters and dynamic date logic; per rules, any calculation that references parameters must be a measure.
